metadata.name: Access To Crypto Currency Wallets By Uncommon Applications
metadata.comment: Detects file access requests to crypto currency files by uncommon processes. Could indicate potential attempt of crypto currency wallet stealing.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND ((contains(lower(file.name), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\ethereum\\keystore\\')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\ethereumclassic\\keystore\\')) OR contains(lower(file.name), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\monero\\wallets\\'))) AND (endswith(lower(file.name), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\bitcoin\\wallet.dat')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\bitcoinabc\\wallet.dat')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\bitcoinsv\\wallet.dat')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\dashcore\\wallet.dat')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\dogecoin\\wallet.dat')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\litecoin\\wallet.dat')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\ripple\\wallet.dat')) OR endswith(lower(file.name), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\zcash\\wallet.dat'))) AND NOT (lower(actor.process.name) = lower('system') OR startswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('c:\\program files (x86)\\')) OR startswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('c:\\program files\\')) OR startswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\')) OR startswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\syswow64\\'))) AND NOT (startswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('c:\\programdata\\microsoft\\windows defender\\')) AND (endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\mpcopyaccelerator.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\msmpeng.exe')))))

output.summary: Detects file access requests to crypto currency files by uncommon processes. Could indicate potential attempt of crypto currency wallet stealing.

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Antivirus, Anti-Spyware, Anti-Malware Software 2. Backup software 3. Legitimate software installed on partitions other than "C:\" 4. Searching software such as "everything.exe" Reference: Internal Research
